books.name: Sherlock holmes 1
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.desc: This is the first edition of Sherlock Holmes series which are written by Sir Conan Doyle. Thrilled, Detective, Interesting novel with lot of plot-twist and creative, extraordinary ways of solving crime

books.name: Sherlock holmes 2
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.desc: This is the second edition of Sherlock Holmes series after the previous Sherlock Holmes 1. We are going to immerse into a Sherlock Holmes world with a lot of bizzare adventure with Sherlock Holmes and his fellow friend, Dr Watson. This adventure is going to break your mind a lot.

books.name: Sherlock holmes 3
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.desc: This is the third and last edition of Sherlock Holmes series after the previous Sherlock Holmes 1. More bizzare, More excitement, More crime, More action. That is the slogan of this edition

books.name: Heart berries
books.author: Terese Marie Mailhot
books.desc: The debut book from the  Terese Marie, a Canadian writer. Writer is going to witness Mailhot and her complicated childhood and tumultuous motherhood. We are going to witness all of Maillot mental health and identity

books.name: Steel
books.author: Nikolai Alekseyevich Ostrovsky
books.desc: The book written by Nikolai A. Ostrovsky. The story about main young man name Pavel Korchagin. Pavel symbolises mans in the revolution in Russian. His transformation from young boy to a teenager and then becomes a tough grown man. His journey suffer lot of pain and he has to do dangerous missions to become a man do everything that country offer him

books.name: Liar club
books.author: Mary Karr
books.desc: The book written by Mary Karr. The story tell her childhood in 1960s in a small industrial town in Texas.Her town is the place where alcohol abuse and phychological problems are common issues
